overview: Billy is a disabled grocery store bagger with increasingly self-destructive delusions that inhibit both his personal and professional life. Dissatisfied with his job and eager to impress a local waitress, Billy abuses personal boundaries and common perceptions to achieve what he believes he deserves. However, when a coworker reaches out to Billy, he must decide to accept genuine friendship or maintain the ideals on which he built his life.
title: Goodfriends
